settings.hero_sub_title: London's finest bespoke framers, with over a decade of experience, we pay every attention to detail. We know frames better than anybody else and understand that choosing the right one can be tricky. Whether you’re looking for something aesthetic, innovative, special or within a certain budget – we have an option for you....

settings.title: Professional Framing
settings.text: We have a variety of modern and traditional frames for you to choose from, offered in a range of materials, including wood, metal and handmade.

settings.title: Mounts
settings.text: We’re sure to have what you’re looking for! We are always stocked with a range of conservation, cotton rag, and museum mount boards.

settings.title: Glazing
settings.text: Modern glazing technology has opened doors and created lots of options for our customers. Our goal is to provide you with a level of expertise that will help you choose the glazing solution that’s best for you.

settings.quote: Getting my works framed here was a great experience! I happened to have a mix of original, higher-end artwork alongside lots of inexpensive vintage ads. The owner helped me come up with frames for all of them, and really took the time to guide me through the decisions. Pricing was also fantastic- he came up with a way for framing the inexpensive items on a lower budget, but they still look great with the fine art pieces. In total took about 2 weeks for 7 pieces. Definitely will get other things framed here in the future!

I had some unusual art work to frame and right from start the two brothers were very engaged and engaging. Aijaz was helpful and patient in exploring the different ways he could approach the challenge. I had a number of specific asks, and when I went to pick the finished frames, I did wonder whether they would have remembered my different requests. I need not have worried - everything was exactly as requested! Very pleased.

Went to get a picture framed up couple of weeks ago. Aijaz was really patient and gave his input into what type of frame would look good. The service was really fast and efficient. Aikaz kept me well informed throughout the process and gave regular updates.

Bermondsey Gallery have framed nine posters for me for permanent display at a nearby business. All nine frames have been completed to an incredible standard.

Aijaz advised on what would work best for each poster and the setting it would be in. I couldn’t be happier with the end result or with the service provided.

I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend Bermondsey Gallery and I’ll be returning to them next time I need an item framing. The gallery also have an interesting range of exhibitions which are well worth viewing.

We've got our canvas framed with Bermondsey Gallery and could not be happier with the results. Process was super easy and Aijaz was very attentive explaining and showing different options/finishing for our canvas. Delivery was on time as agreed, high quality materials. The frame feels sturdy and safe.Definitely using Bermondsey Gallery again and highly recommend.

I go here to frame artworks (so far prints, drawings, cyanotypes etc...) and it's always an enjoyable process with delightful results. Wide range of frames in wood and metal to choose from, museum grade glass etc.. offered, unusual requests catered for. Top stars

Aijaz is super helpful when I was not sure with how I wanted to frame my painting! He was patient and made good recommendations. I absolutely love how the framing came out. 5/5 service and 5/5 quality of the product. I would personally go back for other framing needs.

settings.question: What types of frames do you offer?
settings.answer: We offer a wide variety of frames including wooden, metal, and custom frames. We also provide a range of styles from classic to contemporary to match any decor.

settings.question: How do I choose the right frame for my artwork?
settings.answer: Our experienced staff can help you select the perfect frame to complement your artwork. You can visit our store for a consultation, or you can send us a picture of your artwork and we'll provide recommendations.

settings.question: Can you frame items other than pictures?
settings.answer: Yes! We can frame a wide range of items including certificates, memorabilia, textiles, mirrors, and more. If you have something unique you'd like framed, just ask!

settings.question: How long does it take to get something framed?
settings.answer: Our standard turnaround time is typically 2-3 weeks, but it can vary depending on the complexity of the job and the availability of materials. We will provide an estimated completion time when you place your order.

settings.question: What is the cost of framing?
settings.answer: The cost of framing depends on several factors including the size of the piece, the type of frame, and any additional features such as matting or glass. We offer a range of options to fit different budgets and can provide a detailed quote upon request.

settings.question: Do you offer any guarantees or warranties?
settings.answer: Yes, we stand by the quality of our work. If you are not satisfied with your frame, please let us know and we will work with you to make it right.

settings.question: Can you help with the design process?
settings.answer: Absolutely. Our design experts are here to assist you every step of the way. We can help you choose the right frame, matting, and glass to ensure your piece looks its best.

settings.question: What types of glass do you offer?
settings.answer: We offer several types of glass including standard, non-glare, UV-protective, and museum-quality glass. Each type of glass provides different levels of protection and visibility, and we can help you choose the best option for your needs.

settings.question: Do you offer bulk framing services for businesses or events?
settings.answer: Yes, we offer bulk framing services for businesses, exhibitions, and events. Please contact us to discuss your specific needs and to receive a quote.

settings.question: How can I contact you?
settings.answer: You can reach us by phone at 0207 231 3141, by email at info@bermondseygallery.co.uk, or by using the contact form on our website. We look forward to hearing from you!
